wikipedia_page.main: Charles Hogan (23 April 1926 – 25 October 1992) was an English professional footballer who played as a right winger in the Football League for Bury, Accrington Stanley, Southport and Rochdale. He also played for Lancashire Combination side Wigan Athletic, making four league appearances during the 1953–54 season. He was married and had four children: Elizabeth, John, Carmel and Simon.
